summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3891 for the improvement of 14th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to East 85th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47461, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
